Handling Claims Folder Reviews by Representatives of Non-Veteran Claimants in Cases Where the Veteran Is Living
Do not allow the representative of a non-Veteran claimant to review the claims folder of a living Veteran except where the claimant is acting on behalf of the Veteran.
Do not furnish the claimant or representative any information or material
to which the person is not entitled, or
that does not pertain to the claimant alone.
Reference
:  For more information on representation of a claimant not acting on behalf of the Veteran, see
38 CFR 1.525(a)(2)
.
title: M21-1, Part I, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B - A Representative’s Right to Notification and Review of Records
